text: Pedro María Iguaran Arandia (2 July 1940 – 16 January 2015) commonly known as Pello Iguaran was a Spanish football defender. Iguaran played for Deportivo Alavés in the 1963-1964 season. Iguaran served his new club for 7 years, being in most cases used as a reserve defender.45 años del ascenso de Puertollano Realsociedad.com 24 February 2012 He played a total of 85 games for Real Sociedad. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Spanish footballers
title: Pedro María Iguaran
